title: Pixel Phone unresponsive after attempting to update
content:
My phone won't turn on after attempting to instal the October 2020 update even while pressing volume down + power buttons together . After I clicked update the phone went to the "getting things ready" screen and then it froze. It then turned itself off and I haven't been able to power it back on even after charging for over 4 hours or while being connected.

Please help! What should I do?
